alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Hanover, south central Pender, northeastern Brunswick and eastern Columbus Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Honey Island, or 14 miles west of Leland, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leland, Northwest, Bishop, Batarora, Town Creek, Freeman, Phoenix, Delco, Winnabow, Riegelwood, Belville, Navassa and Sandy Creek. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 35 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
